newsitem.title: USA: Unionamerica Q3 net up vs previous w/charge.
newsitem.headline: Unionamerica Q3 net up vs previous w/charge.

text.p: Unaudited Statement of Operations Under US GAAP
(Dollars in thousands, except for per share data)

NOTE - The unaudited pro-forma results of operations for the third quarter 1995 and nine months ended September 30, 1995, reflect the adjustments necessary to give effect to the additional investment income, reduction in financing cost, and increased goodwill amortization, and the related taxation effects, arising as if the Initial Public Offering and reinsurance commutation had taken place on January 1, 1995.

During the third quarter 1996 certain accruals made during 1995 for gross premiums written and reinsurance ceded, together with related policy acquisition costs and provisions for loss and loss adjustment expenses, were reversed as a result of revised estimates advised to the company by both clients and intermediaries. This had no material impact upon current earnings.
Losses and loss adjustment expenses in the third quarter 1996 include a non-recurring expense of $2,335,000 in respect of bad debt and provisions against certain specific reinsurance recoverables.

Per share income (loss) figures are based upon the weighted average number of shares outstanding and the dilutive effect of share options held by management and the over-allotment options granted to the Underwriters in the Public Offering of December 1995.
